.. _apptainer_remote_list:

apptainer remote list
---------------------

List all apptainer remote endpoints that are configured

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'remote list' command lists all remote endpoints configured for use.

  The current remote is indicated by 'âœ“' in the 'ACTIVE' column and can be changed
  with the 'remote use' command.

::

  apptainer remote list

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer remote list

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for list

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer remote <apptainer_remote>` 	 - Manage apptainer remote endpoints
